entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
